tool_description: A simple API that will return known "fullname" for a given nickname/shortened name.  For example "Chris" returns "christian",    "christopher",  "Christian", and "christina"
title: Nickname to FullName

api_list.name: Get Fullname from Nickname
api_list.description: Pass the nickname (such as "chris") and get the different possible full names back ("christian", "christine", "christopher", "christian", "christina")
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nickname-to-fullname.p.rapidapi.com/nickname/{name}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nickname-to-fullname.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
